summary: A teenage vigilante seeks revenge on a group of violent thugs who raped her handicapped sister and killed her best friend.
cast: Linda Blair|John Vernon|Robert Dryer|Johnny Venokur|Sal Landi|Scott Mayer|Debra Blee|Lisa Freeman|Marcia Karr|Luisa Leschin|Linnea Quigley|Ina Romeo|Jill Jaxx|Mitch Carter|Richard DeHaven|Bob DeSimone|Susan Dean|Joy Hyler|Brian Frishman|Catherine McGoohan|Sean O'Grady|Rebecca Perle|Paula Shaw|Kristi Somers|Troy Tompkins|Perla Walter|Judy Walton|Carole White|Louis Zito|Helen Kelly|Suzee Slater|Brinke Stevens
title: Calles salvajes
